interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 36 Pack 2oz Clear Plastic Empty Bottles Travel Containers with Flip Cap for Hand Sanitizer, Cosmetic, Shampoo, Lotion, Liquid Body Soap, Cream, Toner, BPA-free
Review Date: 2020/10/05
Store: JIUZHU
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '12.09 x 10.28 x 3.07 inches; 13.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '667322945817'}
Review Text: This set of fillable bottles is good quality. I put hand sanitizer in them and they did not leak. They are easy to squeeze and I like the flip top. The 2 oz size is perfect for a weekend away for toiletries.
Review Title: Good quality
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'} I love that the toner is in a spray bottle. I wish the instructions were in A bit more clear. I do not know if you are supposed to spray it on your face and go or use a cotton pad. I do not feel a tightening on my skin like most toners. It leaves my skin soft and it smells wonderful! I have just been spraying it on my face after washing and I like that it’s easier, quicker and less waste when you don’t need a cotton pad. Quick, easy to apply -wonderful smelling toner! SENGOLOGY Water Flosser Professional Countertop Flosser Dental Oral Irrigator -Rechargeable 12 Modes Water Flossing with Cleanable Water Tank for Home, Braces & Bridges Care SENSOLOGY {'Brand': 'SENSOLOGY', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Multiple Operation Modes', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Tank Volume': '700 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 6.57 x 5.08 inches; 1.96 Pounds', 'UPC': '850004585177', 'Manufacturer': 'SENSOLOGY'} This is a good water flosser . I’m comparing it to others I have owned. The last one I had did not last long- this appears to be better made and it just looks nicer overall. The water well holds a fair amount of water however I would like it to hold a bit more. It has many levels of power for the water to spray out. The low is very weak and the high is pretty darn strong and could be painful if you aren’t careful. There are plenty of adjustments in between so you will find one that suits your mouth just right. It also has a “massage “ button which basically cuts down the strength of the jet and makes it pulse to massage your gums. I find it a bit too soft of my gums , even on the highest level. This product does a great job in cleaning between your teeth and below gum line. I hate to floss so this is a great option to keep my teeth clean and well cared for. If your house is Not new and only has one plug in your bathroom, you will appreciate the long cords- both the electrical and the water hose. One thing I like about this water flosser is that it does NOT leak like my other one did. This keeps my counter neat. This is a good product to add to your daily dental hygiene regimen . It is easy and does a great job cleaning .
* If you found this review helpful please click the button below to let Amazon know. Thanks ! Better than flossing or brushing alone! JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof JDO {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I was not impressed with this when I first received it. The package looked old and faded. However when I opened it and used the eyelash curler I was very impressed. The curler worked quickly and easily , it was comfortable and easy to use- my lashes curled well with one squeeze. It comes with two extra pads for the curler. The mascara wand is small and is able to get every lash. I was told the mascara makes my lashes look very natural- of clumpy. The mascara really lengthened my lashes. Long, curled lashes- very natural. Face Lift Tapes for Instant Face, Neck and Eye Lift Kit Tape C CRYSTAL LEMON {'Brand': 'C CRYSTAL LEMON', 'Unit Count': '40.00 Count', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 3.35 x 0.87 inches; 0.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '725330346603'} I tried these strips and they did not stick well, they popped off so I REALLY my face and put toner on and they still popped off. Not a big fan of this product. Not great Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant - No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Solid Deodorant Featuring Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Lavender) PRETTY FRANK {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 5.12 x 1.14 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DSF-BS-LAV'} This deodorant goes on smooth. It has a full lavender scent. It's deodorant qualities are good. the product controls odors all day. I find it non irritating and happy it doesn't have aluminum in it. Pleasant scent 36 Pack 2oz Clear Plastic Empty Bottles Travel Containers with Flip Cap for Hand Sanitizer, Cosmetic, Shampoo, Lotion, Liquid Body Soap, Cream, Toner, BPA-free JIUZHU {'Package Dimensions': '12.09 x 10.28 x 3.07 inches; 13.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '667322945817'} This set of fillable bottles is good quality. I put hand sanitizer in them and they did not leak. They are easy to squeeze and I like the flip top. The 2 oz size is perfect for a weekend away for toiletries. Good quality
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to prioritize skincare and personal care products, focusing on user-friendly, effective, and natural options. Their interest has recently expanded to include travel-friendly containers that facilitate the easy transfer of products, further emphasizing convenience in personal care routines.

- **Application Method:** The user prefers spray formats for skincare and enjoys smooth application methods. Their recent purchase of travel containers highlights a commitment to practicality and efficiency, indicating a desire for dependable performance in various contexts without the need for extra tools.

- **Sensory Experience:** The user values pleasant, natural scents and enjoys fragrances that elevate their skincare routine. Their preference for scents like lavender and coconut continues to enhance their overall experience, establishing a strong connection between sensory enjoyment and product selection.

- **Skin Feel and Efficacy:** The user appreciates products that soften the skin and control odors effectively. They remain open to varied outcomes but seek reliable results, showcasing a desire for efficacy in their skincare and personal care items.

- **Desire for Clarity and Ease of Use:** The user values clear instructions and simple application methods, ensuring a straightforward experience across their personal care routines. Their recent adoption of travel containers demonstrates a commitment to convenience and ease, reinforcing their preference for efficient product use and clarity in when and how to employ their personal care items.
